content: Is there a policy for bumping the bootstrap compiler? Or is it just when someone gets around to it after the latest release? I have some time now, I don't mind doing it
usually when someone gets around to it I think
hmm, there are also annotations in stdarch - do I need to update it first? I don't know how to sync it since it's a submodule
anyway, I'm out of time for this, happy for someone else to take over: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82076

FWIW I was holding off since the beta backports haven't landed: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82062 and I prefer to bootstrap master off of released compiler bootstrapped beta. Ultimately it doesn't matter much.
